Error.title: Something went wrong!

About.title: About_me
About.description-1: Hello! I'm Francis Bernard, as you might have guessed from the big flashy title above. My journey in programming began in 2020, exploring various domains including game development and mobile applications.
About.description-2: Along the way, I discovered my passion for web development, which led me to specialize in this field. Now, I'm a dedicated full-stack developer, driven by the challenge of crafting elegant solutions for complex problems.
About.description-3: Currently, I specialize in modern, scalable web application development, using technologies like React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS and TypeScript.
About.description-4: When I'm not coding, you can find me playing the guitar, reading a good book or immersing myself in video games.
